website_summaries.verdict: Tough golf bag with extra reinforcement on the zippers to provide a long lifespan.
pros: 2 pockets are lined with suede to protect your  valuables from scratches
Offers 10 total pockets to keep 2 gear organized
Top includes 15 dividers for easy identification of clubs
cons: Does not include full length club dividers

customer_reviews.title: The bag is as advertised except it does not have ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is as advertised except it does not have individual full length club dividers which is quite disappointing taking into consideration the premium i paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Achkar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag but no full-length dividers
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I'm a little disappointed that the dividers are not full length despite the description. There are full-length dividers between several sections, but within those sections the club grips can touch each other. Zippers are heavy duty, pockets are large. Can fit at least 5 cans in the built-in cooler.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome golf bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome golf bag! Have been using it all spring/summer and it works perfect! A ton of pockets to store everything I need to bring with! If you are planning on walking 9 or 18 holes I would suggest getting a two strap clip that you can hook onto the bag to carry easier. But this bag is specifically for carts so I do not complain about it, but just a thought if you happen to walk the course every once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golfers Dream bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag its comfortable to carry and there plenty of pockets to store everything. Cool thing is that this bag has pocket cooler for drinks and there are zippers that can access the inside of the club storage area in case you drop something in there, which my other bag did not have. It is also very cosmetically appealing bag as well, so I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Adamson

customer_reviews.title: great zippers.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awsome.. great zippers.. storage for an umbrella... cooler fits to large Gatorades...extra large putter well, played 4 rounds so far and the bag is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rispoli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cart Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great product, plenty of pockets and not oversized or bulky! Easy access to everything while the bag is in the cart. Having the cart strap pass thru the top pocket is a great idea. Allows for more storage and secures the bag really well. I also like the 15th slot for Umbrella and alignment sticks. The cooler can hold a 6 pack and ice. Overall solid bag with plenty of room. It's also good looking... Lots of compliments! Arrived on time even during a holiday week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great cart bag.
customer_reviews.text: The handles on the top are great, as well as the overall design. Well made, has a lined pocket for cell phone and other items susceptible to scratches, e.g., watch. The beverage pocket is large enough to accommodate an ice pack in addition to cans, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JOE C

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf bar!
customer_reviews.text: Nice golf bar! I really like the individual golf club dividers (my primary reason for upgrading my old bag) Also really like the arrangement of the zipper pockets. Build quality seems to be really really good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Went with the all black. Very glad I did. Very sharp and classic look. Lots of pocket space for the unnecessarily large amount of stuff I’ve accumulated.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Landers

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and attractive bag. Most importantly.. very functional!! Carries all I need to include, back up shoes all equipment and keeps organized!! HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Has all you need.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Plenty of room for all my clubs and gear.
customer_reviews.author: stephene crumpton

customer_reviews.title: Taylor Made shoul$ Do better.
customer_reviews.text: Too many pockets. Handle and strap should be on the same side as the ball and tee pockets. You can’t use them to strap in the bag for use in a cart, also would be easier to get at the balls if you use a caddy. Cheap zippers that probably won’t last long. Looks good, but I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my old bad
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a great bag. I have to get used to the individual slots for clubs but other than that, it is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for motor or push cart
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for motor or push cart. Only thing that could be improved would be a slightly larger handle.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph V.

customer_reviews.title: Great pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this bag! Pockets are great and fits perfectly in cart. Great deal! My husband chose this one over the newer model because of the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: BigGim

customer_reviews.title: Great golf bag for my Taylormade clubs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Well made and plenty of compartments to hold everything I need for a round of golf.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Warren

customer_reviews.title: to be good got to look good
customer_reviews.text: took two stroke off my game. to be good got to look good :)
customer_reviews.author: Teri Birk

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bag
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bag. Light enough and not too bulky. I use it with my push cart just to be clear.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Roomy and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Roomy and looks good! There are plenty of pockets, and the cooler and valuables pouch are nice. Yes, the clubs are only covered down the bag 3/4 of the way, but doesn't impact me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a duplicate bag to the one I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a duplicate bag to the one I purchased last year but at a significantly higher price. Very please with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Halosgram

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classy
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I stand out on the course . It is quite elegant and I love the colour
customer_reviews.author: Gadgeek

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great Cart Bag! Many features and pockets. Plenty of room for clubs, could manage to get 18 clubs if you use tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my taylormade Catalina cart back
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my taylormade Catalina cart back. Light weight and just enough room for everything. Only problem is the price which is a little high for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for everything and seems to be well. made, Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Surbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as "used / very good condition". Came brand new. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s what I wanted...what I expected and what I got. Rides well on my push cart as well as power carts. Lots of storage but not overly bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Granger Pa

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag! Has an ample amount of pockets for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag! Has an ample amount of pockets for all my golf stuff. Also, nice touch with adding the "cooler" compartment.
customer_reviews.author: GelTee

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart Bag
customer_reviews.text: Much more durable than any other TaylorMade cart bag I have owned!
customer_reviews.author: MKP

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice back. Very sturdy and high quality zippers. Good amount of pockets for all your needs!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jurgens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the new bag. It has a ton of storage which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Auld

customer_reviews.title: easy to work
customer_reviews.text: Big pockets, easy to work, smooth motion zippers, individual club pockets do not damage grips.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Troland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf bag
customer_reviews.text: Love my new golf bag. I was looking for a cart style bag that had a lot of room yet wasn't too big and this bag fits the bill.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! My boyfriend and Dad Love it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. Bought one for my Boyfriend and Dad! Don’t listen to that guy that showed a picture of a wrong bag! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Yuriela

customer_reviews.title: not a good design. Great color though
customer_reviews.text: The pouch at the top of the bag is right where the strap for the cart goes, not a good design. Great color though. Never used it, sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. Pockets are not what I expected but will make do.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K Beaverson

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent activity at it's best.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I got when i ordered this bag. Can't believe Amazon lets sellers get away with this. Fraudulent activity at it's best.
customer_reviews.author: Hydromorphone

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Needed new bag. This is really nice although price is steeeeeep.
customer_reviews.author: acowlaughing

product_meta.title: TaylorMade Golf- Supreme Cart Bag (Closeout)
product_meta.description: A durable construction ensures no wearing or tearing when using cart straps. Has a large internal insulated cooler pocket, and extra soft, durable bubble lining.
feature_bullets: Keeps valuables protected from weather and scratching

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
